eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}\label{transcomp}
&& \delta_{\epsilon} c_{(k)}^{i_1\ldots i_k} = (-1)^k\left\{ [k-1 -q]
\epsilon^{[i_1} c_{(k-1)}^{i_2 \ldots i_k]} -(1 -
\delta_{k,n})(k+1)\,\bar\epsilon_j c^{ji_1\ldots i_k}_{(k+1)}\right\}\;
(k \geq 2)\,,\nonumber \\
&& \delta_{\epsilon}c_{(0)} = - \bar\epsilon_i c_{(1)}^i\,, \quad
\delta_{\epsilon}c_{(1)}^i = q\epsilon^i c_{(0)} + 2\bar\epsilon_j
c^{ji}_{(2)}\;.
\
